projects.name: PLU2O
projects.description: Engineered a Chrome extension leveraging Gemini AI to condense intricate subjects into 20-word summaries; garnered 300+ in last 3 month page views on the Chrome Web Store.

projects.name: SwagSwap
projects.description: Transformed traditional offline and random WhatsApp chats into an organized online platform with SwagSwap, an innovative marketplace for college students to buy and sell used items within their campus community. Key features include admin-controlled product listings, real-time status notifications, a unique bidding system, and JWT authentication for secure user login.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Created a dynamic website showcasing my learning journey with progress and growth, featuring a dark mode option and optimized for all screen sizes.

experiences.description: Developed a Hospital Management System with distinct pages for doctors, patients, and administrators. Implemented patient signup and doctor-patient management functionalities. Enabled admin privileges for seamless healthcare operations management.

Developed a web portal for efficient student paper submission with real-time updates for teachers. Implemented one-to-one chat functionality between teachers and students. Streamlined submission and review processes by transitioning from offline to the online portal.
